search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for You Need A Budget (you-need-a-budget.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for You Need A Budget can be found at: https://www.youneedabudget.com/pricing/ .

extracted_content.content:
Pricing | YNAB
===============
  

![Image 10: YNAB tree logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/6758a5396561162bbe65ae5c_Tree%20Logo%20Blurple%20(2).svg)![Image 11: Australian flag](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/6758a6c2e8c0f58105ed4f60_flag%20(2).png)

It looks like you're located in Australia.  
We have an Australian version of our website.  
  
Please confirm your location and we’ll send you to the appropriate site!

[I'm in Australia](https://www.youneedabudget.com/pricing/#)

[No, I'm not in Australia](https://www.youneedabudget.com/pricing/#)

![Image 12: Dismiss modal icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/66cc892582cc0cb8c1782479_x%20icon.svg)![Image 13: Card showing 'One free month of YNAB.'](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/675f9022e4ca9512ef776e4f_Referrals-Card-Sparks.svg)

A friend
--------

sent you a free month of YNAB!
------------------------------

‍

Join the movement of YNABers who spend guilt-free thanks to our simple set of life-changing habits.

Start with our 34-day free trial and you'll both get an **additional free month** when you subscribe.

[Start Your Free Trial](https://www.youneedabudget.com/sign-up)

[![Image 14: It's pronounced Why-NAB](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/66fdcbae99333809c14a9de3_Logotype%20Buttermilk.svg) It's pronounced ”why-nab”](https://www.youneedabudget.com/)

*   What is YNAB?
    
    [The App](https://www.youneedabudget.com/features)[The Method](https://www.youneedabudget.com/ynab-method)[Why YNAB Is Different](https://www.youneedabudget.com/why-ynab-is-different)[Our 34-Day Trial](https://www.youneedabudget.com/our-free-34-day-trial)[The Ultimate Get Started Guide](https://www.youneedabudget.com/guide/the-ultimate-get-started-guide)
    
*   Learn
    
    [Free Workshops](https://www.youneedabudget.com/free-workshops)[Blog](https://www.youneedabudget.com/blog)[Guides](https://www.youneedabudget.com/guides)[Help Center](https://www.youneedabudget.com/help-center)
    
*   Share YNAB
    
    [Refer A Friend](https://www.youneedabudget.com/referral-program)[Gift a YNAB Subscription](https://www.youneedabudget.com/give-ynab)[Refer Your Employer](https://www.youneedabudget.com/wellness/share)[Affiliate Program](https://www.youneedabudget.com/affiliate-program)
    
*   [Pricing](https://www.youneedabudget.com/pricing)
*   [For Employers](https://www.youneedabudget.com/wellness)

*   [Log In](https://app.ynab.com/users/sign_in)
*   [Start Your Free Trial](https://www.youneedabudget.com/sign-up)[Accept Your Invite](https://www.youneedabudget.com/sign-up)
*   [![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/6706d2a70c6755ef7adea2ed_open_book_firefly.svg) The Method](https://www.youneedabudget.com/ynab-method)[![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/6706d2a799240c3f3cf186cc_Cellphone_firefly.svg) The App](https://www.youneedabudget.com/features)[![Image 17](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/6706c8ac7c819ed21dd5c1f3_dollar_firefly.svg) Pricing](https://www.youneedabudget.com/pricing)
    
*   What is YNAB?
    
    [The App](https://www.youneedabudget.com/features)[The Method](https://www.youneedabudget.com/ynab-method)[Why YNAB Is Different](https://www.youneedabudget.com/why-ynab-is-different)[Our 34-Day Trial](https://www.youneedabudget.com/our-free-34-day-trial)[The Ultimate Get Started Guide](https://www.youneedabudget.com/guide/the-ultimate-get-started-guide)
    
*   Learn
    
    [Free Workshops](https://www.youneedabudget.com/free-workshops)[Blog](https://www.youneedabudget.com/blog)[Guides](https://www.youneedabudget.com/guides)[Help Center](https://www.youneedabudget.com/help-center)
    
*   Share YNAB
    
    [Refer a Friend](https://www.youneedabudget.com/referral-program)[Gift a YNAB Subscription](https://www.youneedabudget.com/give-ynab)[Refer Your Employer](https://www.youneedabudget.com/wellness/share)[Affiliate Program](https://www.youneedabudget.com/affiliate-program)
    
*   [Log In](https://app.ynab.com/users/sign_in)
    

[Start Your Free Trial](https://www.youneedabudget.com/sign-up)

[Accept Your Invite](https://www.youneedabudget.com/sign-up)

Save $600 in 30 days, $6,000 in one year
========================================

![Image 18: A green illustrated price tag](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/673276322043330897a7484e_pricing_illo_pricetag.svg)

Stop second-guessing your spending.
-----------------------------------

![Image 19: A green illustrated brain with wings](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/67327632b73278c843d42492_pricing_illo_brain.svg)

Stop arguing with your partner about money.
-------------------------------------------

![Image 20: An illustrated palm tree](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/67327632dfa44c73436fad56_pricing_illo_palmtree.svg)

Stop asking if you can afford the life you’d love to live.
----------------------------------------------------------

![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/67325d115867fbc0f83675a3_spark-corner2_meadow.svg)![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/67325d115867fbc0f83675a3_spark-corner2_meadow.svg)

Start living spendfully
-----------------------

Can you put a price on inner peace? Not really. But $109 a year will get you pretty close.

Annual Plan

$9.08 USD\*/month

![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/67b5f78382618c0fba20251d_Rectangle%2011.svg)

$70 Savings!

$109 USD\* paid annually

That's 30 cents a day!

Monthly Plan

$14.99 USD\*/month

\*USD; plus tax where applicable

You’ll save that much almost immediately. You’ll feel better too.

[How About 34 Days for Free?](https://www.youneedabudget.com/sign-up)

_Just push the button!_

What’s in it for you?
---------------------

### 91%

of YNABers say YNAB has changed the way they think about money for the better.\*

### 78%

of YNABers spend money without feeling guilty  since starting YNAB.\*

### 70%

of YNABers could support themselves on savings for 3 months or more.\*

\*based on survey responses

What would you do if money was an opportunity instead of an obstacle?
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Rene used YNAB to hit the road with her terminally ill pup when she realized their time together was limited. The memories made and the freedom experienced inspired her family to continue their adventures—without worrying about the cost. What would spendfulness look like in your own life?

[Hit the Road](https://www.youneedabudget.com/pricing/#)

![Image 24: A close up of a husky licking a woman's face. She is out in the snow wearing a pink winter jacket.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/67327adbadab53938758470c_img_ynaber_rene_meadow%20(1).avif)

“Knowing exactly where you’re going to put your dollars and watching the amount grow is so satisfying, and it helps you understand that money is always under your control.” \-Rene  

Give every dollar a job for 34 days (for free!) and see how life changes.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Here’s how it works:

Start making a plan for your money

🏦 Connect all of your accounts and track them in one place.

💳 Make a plan to tackle debt.

🎯 Set goals and track your progress.

When you spend or make money

🤑️ Practice the [YNAB Method](https://www.youneedabudget.com/ynab-method) and give every dollar a job.

💸 Import transactions and track your spending.

😄 Enjoy more confidence, clarity, and contentment.

One week before your trial ends

✉️ We will send a reminder before your trial expires.

Day 34

⌛️ Free trial ends. No need to cancel! You won’t be charged unless you subscribe\*

🙌 Sign up for a subscription and continue making your money more meaningful.

🫶 Share your subscription with up to 5 favorites.

\*when you sign up directly through YNAB; third-party app stores may require credit card information when signing up for a trial

![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/670dd647454c31f64baaf985_arrow_blurple.svg)![Image 26](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/67327cc647f8f51565944ebf_spark-trio4_blurple.svg)

### A few of the features you need to succeed.

Here's a little bit of what makes YNAB wonderful...

[Learn More About Features](https://www.youneedabudget.com/features)

###### Get a big-picture perspective

See account balances, priorities, goals, and transactions wherever you go with real-time syncing across devices.

###### Share your subscription

Share YNAB with partners, families, and other close-knit groups of up to six people—all for the price of a single subscription!

###### Set saving goals

Prioritize spending and savings goals with our powerful target-setting features, and track your progress at a glance.

###### Demolish debt

Enjoy future-focused freedom with debt management features, including an integrated loan calculator.

[Learn More About Features](https://www.youneedabudget.com/features)

Still wondering if YNAB is worth it?
------------------------------------

We’ll have Ernie drive to your house to prove it, if necessary.\* Until then, check out what other YNABers have to say.

_\*That’s not a threat, Ernie is very nice._

![Image 27](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67243c508406e5699a52fb1e/67243c508406e5699a52fbe6_openingquotes_firefly_outline%20(2).svg)I’m loving the app so far—paying monthly for an app like this seemed crazy before I got settled into it but now I’m not worried about money, have savings, and haven’t had an overdraft in months. I’m absolutely going to keep it going.

Eric,

5 months into using YNAB

![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67243c508406e5699a52fb1e/67243c508406e5699a52fbde_openingquotes_meadow_outline%20(1).svg)YNAB is the best purchase I make every year!!!! There simply isn’t anything else out there that compares to the level of dedication, service, education, community and authenticity that you all represent.

Patti,

YNABer since 2007

![Image 29](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67243c508406e5699a52fb1e/67243c508406e5699a52fbdb_openingquotes_blurple300_outline.svg)A year of YNAB costs less than a massage and is a heck of a lot better for reducing stress.

Kat,

YNABer since 2016

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Is my data safe with YNAB?

There’s a saying that if you’re not paying for the product, YOU’RE the product. When it comes to something as private and confidential as your financial data, we want the reins in your hand. We only want to make money from you paying us money, with you fully knowing and understanding what’s going on.

You pay us the monthly or annual subscription price, and there you have it. That’s it. Transaction complete. That’s how we make our money.

[**Read more about why we don’t (and won’t) sell your data.**](https://www.youneedabudget.com/blog/ynab-privacy)

How much can I expect to save with YNAB?

On average, new YNABers save $600 in their first two months with YNAB. Oh, and more than $6,000 after one year. Also, they enjoy more control and less stress. In terms of an investment, that’s a serious return.

But you don’t have to take our word for it. [**Let the numbers speak for themselves.**](https://www.youneedabudget.com/blog/is-ynab-worth-it-12-customers-weigh-in)

Do you really give college students YNAB for free?

We offer all college students a free 365-day trial. If you’re interested, check out [**our College Program**](https://www.youneedabudget.com/college) to submit proof of enrollment—think student ID card, transcript or tuition statement (but anything that shows you are currently enrolled and includes your name, your school, and the date will do). We can’t wait to help you manage your money!

Can I offer YNAB as a benefit to my employees?

Most certainly! [Financial Wellness by YNAB](https://www.youneedabudget.com/wellness) is a benefits program that combines YNAB app access with our award-winning support and financial education. We help employees build mindful spending habits so they can be fully present to collaborate, create, and connect when they're at work.

You can learn more, start your team's self-service subscription, or contact our Enterprise sales team at [ynab.com/wellness](https://ynab.com/wellness).

Do you have a YNAB family plan?

Yes, it's all included in your YNAB subscription! [You can share your YNAB with partners, families, and other close-knit groups of up to six people](https://www.youneedabudget.com/blog/introducing-ynab-together-for-your-shared-financial-journey)—all for the price of a single subscription.

Does bank import work for non-US/Canadian banks?

Direct import currently supports select US, Canadian, UK, and EU Banks. If you don’t live in any of those regions, [**File-Based Import**](https://support.ynab.com/en_us/file-based-import-a-guide-Bkj4Sszyo) works like a charm. (It’s seriously slick, you should try it.)

Is the exchange rate taken into account with pricing?

YNAB is priced in US dollars. Exchange rates are not reflected in the price.

Is a credit card required to sign up?

Nope, no credit card needed when you sign up directly through us! Sign up and try YNAB free for 34 days without ever entering your credit card by using the Free Trial button above. At the end of your free trial, you can pick one of the plans (monthly or yearly) and enter your payment method.  
  
Keep in mind that third-party app stores may require credit card information when signing up for a trial.

Does YNAB support multiple currencies?

You can select the currency you want to use in YNAB, but you can’t use multiple currencies together in a single spending plan.

I have YNAB 4, do I need to buy it again?

If you’d like to use the new YNAB, you will need to create a new account, sign-up for a free, 34-day trial, and then (hopefully!) purchase a subscription. If you’d like to continue using YNAB 4, check out [**this page**](https://www.youneedabudget.com/blog/ynab-4-support-will-end-october-2019) for all of the details on compatibility and support.

If I upgrade from YNAB 4, is there a discount for existing users?

Yes! [**Upgrade here**](https://app.youneedabudget.com/upgrade), and a 10% lifetime discount will be automatically applied to your annual subscription.

How do I move my YNAB 4 financial plan to the new YNAB?

Follow the steps [in this article](https://support.ynab.com/en_us/how-to-migrate-from-ynab-4-classic-SknCxaj82) to migrate your YNAB 4 account!

![Image 30: A phone with the YNAB app coming out of a squiggly shaped-portal surrounded by sparks and bubbles](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640f69143ec11b21d42015c6/6754de565af65477ffcabd04_img_app_blob_firefly_realsimple%20(1).avif)

Love How You Spend
------------------

Try the life-changing money app that helps you spend smarter.

[Start Your Free Trial](https://www.youneedabudget.com/sign-up)

[Browse Features](https://www.youneedabudget.com/features)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is straightforward with monthly and annual subscription options. A free trial is available for 34 days.

features: Share subscription with up to 5 people
Share subscription with up to 5 people

promotional_offers.offer_description: Receive an additional free month when referred by a friend.
